rankle.中释: 溃烂, 发炎, 怨恨

dilate.中释: 扩大, 详述, 膨胀

piddle.中释: 撒尿, 鬼混, 游荡

comply.中释: 顺从, 答应, 遵守

modify.英释: to make small changes to something in order to improve it and make it more suitable or effective

verify.中释: 检验, 校验, 查证, 核实[计] 打开或关闭文件的读写校验

debunk.中释: 揭穿, 拆穿假面具, 暴露

quench.英释: to stop a fire from burning

embody.中释: 具体表达, 使具体化, 包含, 收录

scrawl.英释: to write in a careless and untidy way, so that your words are not easy to read

outwit.英释: to gain an advantage over someone using tricks or clever plans

depose.中释: 免职, 废(王位), 作证

recoup.中释: 赔偿, 补偿, 扣除

adjure.中释: 起誓, 恳请, (以起誓或诅咒等形式)命令
adjure.英释: to order or try to persuade someone to do something

indict.中释: 起诉, 控告, 指控, 告发

compel.英释: to force someone to do something

coerce.英释: to force someone to do something they do not want to do by threatening them

incise.英释: to cut a pattern, word etc into something, using a sharp instrument

careen.中释: 倾斜, 倾, (为修理或清洁而)使倾侧

dispel.中释: 驱散, 驱逐, 使消散

induce.中释: 劝诱, 促使, 导致, 引起, 感应

assoil.中释: 赦免, 释放, 补偿

ingest.中释: 摄取, 咽下, 吸收

enmesh.英释: to catch or involve in or as if in a net or snare; entangle

aerate.中释: 使暴露于空气中, 使充满气体

pester.英释: to annoy someone, especially by asking them many times to do something

ossify.英释: to change into bone or to make something change into bone

demote.英释: to make someone’s rank or position lower or less important

denude.中释: 使裸露, 剥下, 剥夺, 脱毛

expand.中释: 使膨胀, 详述, 扩张

rejoin.中释: 使再结合, 再加入, 再回答

stanch.中释: 使止血, 止, 止流, 止血
stanch.英释: to stem the flow of (a liquid, esp blood) or (of a liquid) to stop flowing

emboss.中释: 饰以浮饰, 使浮雕出来

redeem.中释: 赎回, 挽回, 恢复, 补偿, 兑换

propel.英释: to move, drive, or push something forward

inhale.英释: to breathe in air, smoke, or gas

indite.中释: 写(文章,信等)创作, 赋诗, 创作

retard.中释: 延迟, 使减速, 阻止, 妨碍, 阻碍

loathe.英释: to hate someone or something very much

detest.英释: to hate something or someone very much

outfox.英释: If you outfox someone, you defeat them in some way because you are more clever than they are

heckle.中释: 以麻梳梳理, 激烈质问, 诘问, 集中质问

ordain.中释: 注定, 规定, 任命(牧师)
ordain.英释: to order that something should happen
